title: Google Play Store will soon get rid of the Play Movies & TV tab
content:
In addition to being home to millions of Android apps, the Google Play Store is also a place where you can buy movies, ebooks, and audiobooks. But it seems you won’t be able to purchase or rent movies from the Play Store in the future. In an announcement on Tuesday, Google revealed that the Play

The post Google Play Store will soon get rid of the Play Movies & TV tab appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The Play Movies & TV section will soon be removed from the Google Play Store, with the Google TV app serving as your new one-stop-shop.
